name: Metelite
description:
This game is set in space. You  are an alien that got into a fight with others from your planet. Avoid obstacles and laser shooting satelites to survive this deadly battle.

Your goal is just to survive, and to get as many spaceship components as you can to increase your final score.

Let's see what score you can get in the game, our best is  100 seconds with 66 spaceship parts(Write your highscore in the comments)!

The community's best score is:
